channel.title: Realistic dreameR
channel.description: hope that I am again crazy about something...

item.title: Child with low self-esteem
item.description: Child with low self-esteem has specific characteristics and we will find them in this post and take a look at your child what he or she has.

item.title: Child with high self-esteem
item.description: Child with high self-esteem has several characteristics, such as being like to have new relationships with new people, empathy, consideration, kind, polite, satisfaction, like new things, passionate, positive way of thinking, using positive words

item.title: People with low self-esteem
item.description: If 'pride' arises from interactions with other people, then 'self-esteem' has to be found within yourself. Rather than an objective and neutral judgment, it has a strong feeling of subjectiveness.

item.title: People with high self-esteem
item.description: When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. It is that they have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.

item.title: Self-esteem
item.description: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem. On the contrary, low-self-esteem makes people think in a negative way which makes everything goes not well. What's self-esteem?

item.title: sudo without password
item.description: I use my intel NUC, Raspberry Pi and iMac alone and feel aways inconvenience to enter password when I run sudo command. Here I like to introduce how to run sudo without password and pkexec use case.

item.title: How to control being talkative
item.description: "Once spoken, it can not be taken back." Are you a very talkative person who wants to control being talkative?
